sources.title: Much Too Shy
sources.description: Title: Much Too Shy Summary: A handyman and amateur artist gets into trouble when nude female bodies are added to the heads he has drawn of prominent ladies, and are sold as soap adverts. Directed by: Marcel Varnel Actors: George Formby, Kathleen Harrison, Hilda Bayley Production Company: Columbia British Productions Release Date: 12 October 1942 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A handyman and amateur artist gets into trouble when nude female bodies are added to the heads he has drawn of prominent ladies, and are sold as soap adverts.

metadata.Plot: A handyman and amateur artist gets into trouble when nude female bodies are added to the heads he has drawn of prominent ladies, and are sold as soap adverts.
metadata.Writer: Ronald Frankau, Walter Greenwood, Michael Vaughan
